message.subject: City of Glendale
message.content:
M1.1. Sara,
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. Believe it or not, we are very close getting our signed ISDA from the City of Glendale.
[Inform: Kim et al. are getting close to getting a signed ISDA from the City of Glendale]
M1.3. Steve Lins, the City attorney had a couple of questions which I will attempt to relay without having a copy of the documents.
[Inform: Steve Lins, the City attorney, had some questions, which Kim is attempting to relay]
M1.4. 1) I am assuming that he obtained a for legal opinion letter or document of some sort.
M1.5. This document references a confirmation and we are not sure what this references.
M1.6. Typically, it references a transaction, which in this case, there are no transactions yet.
M1.7. He feels this reference should be deleted.
[Inform: Steve Lins thinks an unclear reference should be deleted from a document]
M1.8. What is your opinion regarding this?
[Request-Information: Sara's opinion on this]
Flink1.8
M1.9. 2) We sent him a couple of form documents to facilitate the documents required under the ISDA.
M1.10. One form ws a form resolution.
M1.11. They have already received City Council approval to enter into financial tranactions and to enter into an ISDA with us.
M1.12. Steve is going to get a certified copy of this Resolution.
[Inform: Kim et al. sent Steve Lins some form documents to facilitate documents required under the ISDA, including a form resolution, of which Steve is going to get a certified copy, since they already have City Council approval]
M1.13. Will this suffice?
[Request-Information: is this good enough]
Flink1.13
M1.14. When you return, I may try to do one last conference call to alleviate any unanswered questions.
[Inform: when Sara returns, Kim may attempt one more conference call to resolve her unanswered questions]
M1.15. I think we will have an executed ISDA with the City of Glendale by the end of next week.
M1.16. I am going to be out there meeting with them on Wednesday.
[Inform: Kim thinks they will get an executed ISDA with Glendale by the end of next week, and she will be there to meet with officials on Wednesday]
M1.17. Thanks for your help,
[Conventional: thanks]
